TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebImage extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents an object that lets you display and manage images in a web page.

Public Function AddImageWatermark (watermarkImageFilePath As String, Optional width As Integer = 0, Optional height As Integer = 0, Optional horizontalAlign As String = "Right", Optional verticalAlign As String = "Bottom", Optional opacity As Integer = 100, Optional padding As Integer = 5) As WebImage

MemberSignature.Usage: webImage.AddImageWatermark (watermarkImageFilePath, width, height, horizontalAlign, verticalAlign, opacity, padding)

Docs.param: The path of a file that contains the watermark image.
The width, in pixels, of the watermark image.
The height, in pixels, of the watermark image.
The horizontal alignment for watermark image. Values can be "Left", "Right", or "Center".
The vertical alignment for the watermark image. Values can be "Top", "Middle", or "Bottom".
The opacity for the watermark image, specified as a value between 0 and 100.
The size, in pixels, of the padding around the watermark image.
Docs.summary: Adds a watermark image using a path to the watermark image.

Docs.param: The text to use as a watermark.

The font size of the watermark text.
The font style of the watermark text.
The font type of the watermark text.
The horizontal alignment for watermark text. Values can be "Left", "Right", or "Center".

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.Helpers.WebImage Save (string filePath = default, string imageFormat = default, bool forceCorrectExtension = true);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Helpers.WebImage Save(string filePath, string imageFormat, bool forceCorrectExtension) cil managed
Public Function Save (Optional filePath As String = Nothing, Optional imageFormat As String = Nothing, Optional forceCorrectExtension As Boolean = true) As WebImage
member this.Save : string * string * bool -> System.Web.Helpers.WebImage

Docs.param: The path to save the image to.
The format to use when the image file is saved, such as "gif", or "png".

true to force the correct file-name extension to be used for the format that is specified in ; otherwise, false. If there is a mismatch between the file type and the specified file-name extension, and if is true, the correct extension will be appended to the file name. For example, a PNG file named Photograph.txt is saved using the name Photograph.txt.png.
Docs.summary: Saves the image using the specified file name.
